The Elephant in The Room

A hypnotic lo-fi/industrial dance march: a modded accordion snarls over warm analog bass and dusty Linn-style drums, with glitch accents and metallic textures pushing Phrygian-charged tension toward slam-back drops and bit-crushed echoes.

  • Album: Single
  • Genre: lo-fi, electronic, industrial
  • Mood:
  • Duration: 3:12
